name: Bedroom - Sample
description: Sample escape room in the bedroom
hints: The cafe owner loves riddles. She uses it to sometimes hide intermediate clues!
That destination list is pretty interesting. I remember the owner saying she used some letters and positions to create a password. Maybe the numbers that I found could help me find the destinations??
I remember something! I need to find some letters and check the position on a list...my memory is super foggy right now.
The owner did tell me one time that she made a backup just in case. She said it was some drawing...
